thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hope Bancorp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.13

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hope Bancorp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.13
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Hope Bancorp Inc:
* HOPE BANCORP REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 EXCLUDING ITEMS * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME BEFORE PROVISION FOR LOAN LOSSES INCREASED TO $126.4 MILLION FROM $123.3 MILLION IN Q3
* ONE-TIME, NON-CASH CHARGE RELATED TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT ADVERSELY IMPACTED Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE BY $0.19 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
